Project Description
The Unity Application Block (Unity) is officially under new ownership.
https://github.com/unitycontainer/unity

This project has relocated!

Unity is now being managed entirely by the community. You can read the official announcement here: http://blogs.msdn.com/b/dotnet/archive/2015/08/21/the-future-of-unity.aspx
The new repository is located here:
https://github.com/unitycontainer/unity
